criteria.text: The student submits a link to their CV deployed on gh-pages through the RS App
The HTML markup is valid. Use the W3C Markup Validator (https://validator.w3.org/) to check validity
The CV includes header, main, and footer elements
The CV contains a nav element used appropriately
The CV includes only one h1 heading in the document
The CV uses multiple h2 headings to structure the content
Footer includes a link to the author's GitHub profile, the year of creation, the RS School logo, and a link to the RS School course
CSS is used to format the CV layout and design effectively
The CV page remains horizontally centered when the browser window is resized
The CV includes an author photo or avatar with proper proportions and an alt attribute
Navigation, contact information, and skills are formatted using list structures (ul/ol with li or li > a)
Contact information is included (e.g., email, GitHub, LinkedIn)
A list of skills relevant to the student is included
A code example is added using proper HTML characters or code tags
A list of educational projects with links to source code or deployed apps is included
Information about education and English proficiency level is included
The CV content is written entirely in English
